org.ow2.chameleon.core

Class Chameleon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.chameleon.core.Chameleon

  • public class Chameleon
extends Object
    Chameleon main entry point.
    Version:
    $Id: 1.0.4 $Id
    Author:
    The OW2 Chameleon Team

        The framework manager holding the OSGi framework instance.

        Chameleon Logger. This logger is not shared among instances.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Chameleon

        public Chameleon(File basedir,
                 boolean interactive,
                 Map<String,Object> userProperties)
          throws IOException
        Creates a chameleon instance.
        Parameters:
        basedir - the base directory
        interactive - if the interactive mode enabled.
        userProperties - the system properties provided by the user in command line
        Throws:
        IOException - if the chameleon instance cannot be created.

      • Chameleon

        public Chameleon(ChameleonConfiguration configuration)
          throws IOException
        Creates a chameleon instance.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the configuration to use
        Throws:
        IOException - if the chameleon instance cannot be created.

      • Chameleon

        public Chameleon(boolean interactive)
          throws IOException
        Creates a Chameleon instance. This constructor does not allows to set the core directory (so, uses 'core'), nor the chameleon properties.

        Notice that if the 'chameleon.base' system property is set, it uses this location.

        Parameters:
        interactive - is the debug mode enabled.
        Throws:
        IOException - something wrong happens.

      • Chameleon

        public Chameleon(String basedir,
                 boolean interactive)
          throws IOException
        Creates a Chameleon instance. This constructor does not allows to set the core directory (so, uses 'core'), nor the chameleon properties.
        Parameters:
        basedir - the chameleon's base directory
        interactive - is the debug mode enabled.
        Throws:
        IOException - something wrong happens.

      • Chameleon

        public Chameleon(boolean interactive,
                 Map<String,Object> userProperties)
          throws IOException
        Creates a Chameleon instance. This constructor does not allows to set the core directory (so, uses 'core'), nor the chameleon properties, but support user properties specified by the user using -Dxxx=yyy in the command line arguments.

        Notice that if the 'chameleon.base' system property is set, it uses this location.

        Parameters:
        interactive - is the debug mode enabled.
        userProperties - the user properties
        Throws:
        IOException - something wrong happens.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeLoggingSystem

        public static org.slf4j.Logger initializeLoggingSystem(ChameleonConfiguration configuration)
        Initialized the logging framework (backend).
        Parameters:
        configuration - chameleon's configuration.
        Returns:
        the chameleon logger

      • initializeActivatorList

        private void initializeActivatorList(ChameleonConfiguration configuration)

      • start

        public Chameleon start()
                throws org.osgi.framework.BundleException
        Initializes and Starts the Chameleon frameworks. It configures the embedded OSGi framework and deploys bundles.
        Returns:
        the current Chameleon instance
        Throws:
        org.osgi.framework.BundleException - if a bundle cannot be installed or started correctly.

      • waitForStability

        public Chameleon waitForStability()
        Waits for the stability to be reached.
        Returns:
        the current Chameleon instance
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the stability cannot be reached
        Since:
        1.10.6

      • stop

        public Chameleon stop()
               throws org.osgi.framework.BundleException,
                      InterruptedException
        Stops the underlying framework.
        Returns:
        the current Chameleon instance
        Throws:
        org.osgi.framework.BundleException - should not happen.
        InterruptedException - if the method is interrupted during the waiting time.

      • context

        public org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context()
        Retrieves the bundle context of the underlying framework. The framework must have been successfully started first.
        Returns:
        the bundle context

      • framework

        public org.osgi.framework.launch.Framework framework()
        Retrieves the underlying framework. The framework must have been successfully started first.
        Returns:
        the bundle context
